content:
This code snippet defines a set of command bindings in an editor interface, mapping specific actions like 'LE-MakeLive' and 'LE-SaveScene' to their respective handler functions. These bindings enable users to perform essential operations such as creating new scenes, saving work, opening existing files, quitting the application, and handling mouse interactions within the editor environment.

('LE-MakeLive', self.objectMgr.makeSelectedLive),
            ('LE-NewScene', self.ui.onNew),
            ('LE-SaveScene', self.ui.onSave),
            ('LE-OpenScene', self.ui.onOpen),
            ('LE-Quit', self.ui.quit),
            ('DIRECT-mouse1', self.handleMouse1),
            ('DIRECT-mouse1Up', self.handleMouse1Up),
            ('DIRECT-mouse2', self.handleMouse2),
            ('DIRECT-mouse2Up', self.handleMouse2Up),
            ('DIRECT-mouse3', self.handleMouse3),
            ('DIRECT-mouse3Up', self.handleMouse3Up),
            ('DIRECT-toggleWidgetVis', self.toggleWidget),
        ])
